name: 消費者行為
restrict: ◎必須先修過【BAU0021  行銷管理】 ◎課程開放上修
goals: Develop an understanding of consumer behavior theories and apply this understanding in a marketing decision making context.
Evaluate the principal theories of consumer behavior; critically assess strengths, limitations and analyze the current trends in consumer behavior

Apply your consumer behavior research findings when designing and evaluating marketing strategies. Improve your abilities to discover original consumer insights that go beyond surface level intuitions.
syllabus:
W1 Opening speech

W2 Ch1: Introduction

W3 Ch2: Consumer research Ch3: Market segmentation

W4 Ch4: Consumer motivation

W5 Ch5: Consumer personality

W6 Ch6: Consumer perception

W7 Ch7: Consumer learning

W8 Mid-term

W9 Ch8: Consumer attitude

W10 Ch9: Communication and attitude change

W11 Ch16: Consumer decision making 1/2

W12 Ch16: Consumer decision making 2/2

W13 Ch10: Reference group and family influence

W14 Ch11: Social class

W15 Ch12: Culture

W16 Ch13: Sub-culture

W17 Ch14: Cross culture Ch15: Opinion leadership and new product diffusion process

W18 Final exam

methodologies.note: Help students learn how to think and express in extemporaneous discussions

grading.note: Mid-term: First half materials covered in the semester
Final exam: Second half materials covered in the semester

prerequisite: Prerequisite course: 【BAU0021  Marketing Management】 ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
